name: Operation Feuersturm
overview: You are Mr. James Bond and have 48 hours to find the nuclear bomb or it will be detonated. Found in Power-Games (Bestell-Nr. 38739). You are an agent and you are about to go on vacation. when your boss calls and summons you to his office. He lets you know that an atomic bomb has been stolen from a large organization and unless two million pounds in gold are provided within 48 hours, it will be fired on a major city The only clue you get is the information that the rocket was on an estate - the headquarters of the Organization stands that needs to be found. As always, the boss downplays the matter to you. By the way, you learn that a plane is already waiting and you don't even have 48 hours to complete the job. Of course, as you are known as a top agent, you are dependent on yourself. Your Chief also tells you that you must not communicate with Headquarters until the job is complete. Well then. Have fun with this German-language text/graphics adventure.
